headline.main: Should We Battle The Iraqis, Too?

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''The Wrong Time to Fight Iraq'' (editorial, Nov. 26): Saddam Hussein's government has acted repressively and aggressively against its own people, its neighbors, and American and allied soldiers during 20 years of rule.
abstract: David Scheffer letter on Nov 26 editorial holds United States need not wait for evidence of Iraqi role in international terrorism to indict Saddam Hussein before international criminal tribunal
snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''The Wrong Time to Fight Iraq'' (editorial, Nov. 26):     Saddam Hussein's government has acted repressively and aggressively against its own people, its neighbors, and American and allied soldiers during 20 years of rule....
